name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 4 - Horror At Number 50
name_original: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 4 - Horror At Number 50
description: Ben's latest case finds him investigating the mysterious Number 50 in Berkeley Square, London. The site of several ghost stories, infamous for its famous "horror," paranormal activity at Number 50 has been dormant for nearly 100 years. Until now...
